messages.title: The choice for Colchester
messages.content: YouGov polling puts Martin Goss in a slight lead for winning Colchester this election - every vote is going to count to stop the cutting Conservative candidate. Conservative candidates only divide the Lib Dems are now the challenger party in Colchester, not Labour.

mentions.tacticalSituation: YouGov polling puts Martin Goss in a slight lead for winning Colchester this election - every vote is going to count to stop the cutting Conservative candidate. Conservative candidates only divide the Lib Dems are now the challenger party in Colchester, not Labour.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has helped many people in Colchester on local issues and ensured people's needs are served best.

endorsements.endorsement: I got to know Martin through his hard work in the community before he became elected as a Borough Councillor. He has a track record of helping many people in Colchester on local issues and ensured my needs were served best. Martin has always made time for me since we first met. That personal dedication to helping people make the best MP for Colchester.

For many years a Labour Party member and activist, I felt robbed when Momentum took over Colchester Labour Party and forced Peter Oborn to resign. A few short months later, I switched to the Liberal Democrats as the only credible local alternative on the ballot paper for parliamentary elections. Martin is the only person who really needs my vote.

I have been a lifelong Conservative voter but when the Tory Government has handled Brexit and the economy convinced me that the Liberal Democrats were the only way forward, I finally met Martin Goss and the Liberal Democrats in the process. He has a track record of helping many people in Colchester on local issues and ensured my needs were served best. He has always made time for me since we first met. That personal dedication to helping people make the best MP for Colchester.

quotes.text: Independently minded and straight talking, Martin Goss will always put you and Colchester first.
Martin has spent most of his life in Colchester. He knows the issues and will fight on your behalf to get better outcomes.
Enough talk, it is time for real action to tackle our appalling infrastructure and increasing crime - Martin will be demanding results.

images.caption: MARTIN GOSS FOR ALL OF COLCHESTER
